span.strong: Administrative Assistants at the Schools will be available on weekdays to receive phone calls and will be happy to assist families as needed. Please call:
BHS: Between 8-10 am dial 619-491-7022; Between 9-11 am dial 623-562-0320; Between 10-12 dial 920-659-4137; Between 12-2 pm dial 920-581-5149; Between 2-4 pm 920-659-4244
BMS: Between 9-11 am dial 920-581-5148; Between 10-12 pm dial 920-659-4298;
BIS: Between 9-11 am dial 920-581-5057; Between 12-2 pm dial 920-581-5134
BES: Between 9-11 am dial 920-659-4216; Between 12-2 pm dial 920-659-4180

span.p: CLICK HERE to read the Superintendent's Message 04/21/2020.

a.title: Click to read more about: Superintendent Message 04.21.2020
Click to read more about: Superintendent's Message 04/12/2020

span.p: At the School Committee meeting on 4/8/20, it was decided that given the current remote learning situation, it is in the best interest of students to cancel April vacation this year. Please remember that Monday, April 20th is a state holiday and therefore, will remain as a 'no school' day. This means that as it stands now, the official last day of school will be June 15th.
Thank you to everyone who voted in our on-line poll. There was a consistent majority across all respondents and that helped inform the decision.
A more comprehensive Superintendent's report will be sent this weekend.

a.title: Click to read more about: April Vacation
